title: Certeyn meditations and thinges to be had in remembraunce, and well considered by euery Christia[n], before he receiue the sacrament of the body and bloude of Christ. Compiled by T. Broke.
author: Broke, Thomas.
publicationStmtDate: Anno. M.D.xl.viii. the. xvii. of August. [1548]
publicationStmtPublisher: By Iohn Day and Wyllyam Seres, dwellynge in Sepulchres Parish at the signe of the Resurrection a little aboue Holbourne Conduite],
